column2: "Ahasuerus ne ba Darius a n’ase fi Mediafo mu a wɔyɛɛ no Kaldeafo ahenman do ɔhen no
column4: "n’ahendzi afe a odzi kan no mu no nna emi Daniel metsee ase wɔ nwoma no mu
column5: mfe dodow a EWURADZE asɛm baa nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia hɔ dɛ ɔbɛma Jerusalɛm amamfoyɛ ewie du wɔ mfe eduosuon mu no ho."

column3: dɛ medze mbuada
column4: na eyitam
column5: na nso

column3: na mekaa mo bɔn
column4: mesee dɛ
column5: Ao EWURADZE
column6: Nyankopɔn kɛse a no ho yɛ hu a osie ahyɛmudzi na mbɔbɔrhu ma hɔn a wɔdɔ no na wosie ne mbrasɛm;"

column3: na yɛabɔ ɔbrakyew
column4: na yɛayɛ emumuyɛ
column5: na yɛatsew etua
column6: dɛ yɛaman efi w’ahyɛdze na w’atsɛmbudze ho mpo;"

column2: "na yenntsie wo nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no a wɔdze wo dzin kasaa kyerɛɛ hɛn ahemfo
column3: hɛn asafohemfo
column4: na hɛn egyanom
column5: na asaase no do nkorɔfo no nyina no."

column3: ɔwo na ndzeyɛtsenenee dzi wɔ wo
column4: na hɛn dze
column5: enyimguase dzi wɔ hɛn
column6: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi; na Judafo
column10: wɔ nkurow nkurow a hɔn mfom a wɔafom wo ntsi etu hɔn akɔ hɔ no do."

column3: hɛn na enyimguase dzi wɔ hɛn
column4: hɛn ahemfo
column5: hɛn asafohemfo

column2: "EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn na mbɔbɔrhu na fakyɛ dzi wɔ no; na hɛn dze
column3: yɛatsew no do etua;"
dɛ yɛbɛnantsew ne mbra a ɔnam no nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo do dze sii hɛn enyim no mu."
Israel nyina ato wo mbra
column4: na wɔaman nkyɛn
column5: dɛ wɔrennyɛ setsie mma wo ndze; dɛm ntsi na woehue ndom no egu hɛn do
column6: na ntam no a wɔakyerɛw no Nyankopɔn akowaa Moses mbra mu no; osiandɛ yɛayɛ bɔn etsia no."

column2: "Na ɔahyɛ ne nsɛm a ɔkasae tsiaa hɛn
column3: na hɛn atsɛmbufo a wobuu hɛn atsɛn no dzen
column4: dɛ ɔdze mbusu kɛse yi aba hɛn do: na wɔnnyɛɛ bi pɛn wɔ wi ase nyina dɛ mbrɛ wɔayɛ no wɔ Jerusalɛm no."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no Moses mbra mu no
column3: na mbusu yi nyina aba hɛn do: naaso yɛnnserɛɛ EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn n’enyimtsewee
column4: dɛ yɛbɛdan efi hɛn emumuyɛ ho
column5: na yeenya nhumu wɔ wo nokwar no mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE atweɔn na ber a ɔsɛ mu no
column3: ɔdze atoyerɛnkyɛm aba hɛn do: na EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn dze
column4: ɔtsen wɔ n’edwuma a ɔyɛ nyina mu
column5: na hɛn na yɛannyɛ setsie amma ne ndze."

column3: hɛn EWURADZE Nyankopɔn a edze wo nsa a ɔyɛ dzen yii wo man fii Egypt asaase do dze gyee dzin
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse ndɛ da yi: yɛayɛ bɔn
column5: yɛayɛ no emumuyɛ mu."

column3: dɛ mbrɛ wo tsenenee nyina tse no
column4: meserɛ wo
column5: ma w’ebufuw na w’ebufuhyew ndan mfi wo kurow Jerusalɛm
column6: wo bepɔw krɔnkrɔn no do: osian hɛn bɔn ntsi
column8: na Jerusalɛm na wo man adan ahorohoraadze ama hɔn a wɔabɔ hɛn ho aprɔw yi."

column3: hɛn Nyankopɔn
column4: yɛ aso ma w’akowaa ne mpaabɔ
column5: na no nkotoserɛ
column6: na ma w’enyim nhyerɛn wo krɔnkrɔnbea a ayɛ amamfo no do

column3: brɛ w’aso adze tsie; bue w’enyiwa
column4: na hwɛ hɛn amamfo
column5: na kurow a wɔbɔ wo dzin frɛ no no: na yɛmmfa hɛn nkotoserɛ mmbɔto w’enyim wɔ hɛn tsenenee ntsi
column6: na mbom wo mbɔbɔrhu akɛse no ntsi a."

column3: fa kyɛ; ao EWURADZE
column4: yɛ aso na yɛ; mma nkyinkyim; ao me Nyankopɔn
column5: osian ɔwoara ntsi
column6: osiandɛ wo dzin na wɔbɔ frɛ wo kurow na wo man."

column3: na morobɔ mpaa
column4: na mereka mo bɔn na me man Israel hɔn bɔn
column5: na medze mo nkotoserɛ roto EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn enyim ama me Nyankopɔn ne bepɔw krɔnkrɔn no;"

column3: meda do rekasa wɔ mpaabɔ mu no
column4: ɔbɔfo Gabriel a muhun no enyido adzehu no mu ahyɛse no tuu paa baa me nkyɛn wɔ ewimbir afɔrbɔ ber mu."

column3: na ɔnye me kasae dɛ
column4: Daniel e
column5: afei maba dɛ merebɛma awea ntseasee ho."

column3: mbrasɛm no fiir edzi
column4: na maba dɛ merebɛka akyerɛ wo; osiandɛ wɔdɔ wo kɛse dɛ: dɛm ntsi dwendwen asɛm no ho
column5: na tse enyido adzehu no ase."

column2: "Wɔahyɛ mfe eduosuon ahorow esuon mbra wɔ wo man na wo kurow krɔnkrɔn no do
column3: dɛ wonwie mbrato
column4: wɔmma bɔn mbɔ adze
column5: wɔmpata mma emumuyɛ
column7: na wɔnsɔw enyido adzehu na nkɔnhyɛ ano
column8: na wɔnsera akrɔnkrɔndze mu akrɔnkrɔndze no ngo."

column3: ofitsi mbrasɛm a ɔka dɛ wɔnsan nkyekyer Jerusalɛm nsi n’ananmu no dze kesi ɔhen a wɔasera no no do no yɛ mfe esuon: na mfe esuon ahorow eduosia ebien na wɔdze bɛkyekyer ɔbrɔn na ɔfasu no wɔ ahohiahia ber mu mpo."
wobotwa nyia wɔasera no no akyen
column4: na onnkenya biribiara: na ɔhen a ɔbɛba no ne man bɛsɛɛ kurow na krɔnkrɔnbea no; na n’ewiei bɛba wɔ nsuyirii mu
column5: ɔko bɛba araa dze ekesi ase; woesua amamfoyɛ ato hɔ."

column2: "Na ɔnye pii bedzi ahyɛmu pintsinn mfe esuon: na ber no ne finimfin ɔbɛma okum afɔr na edziban afɔr abɔ adze; na ekyiwadze no etsifi na amamfoyɛfo besi; na ɔdze ekowie dɛ dza woesua ato hɔ no
column3: woehue ebufuw egu amamfoyɛfo no do."
